Class MeteorSwarmCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.MeteorSwarmCard.MeteorSwarmCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewableCard, Serializable
public class MeteorSwarmCard extends AdventureCard implements Serializable, ViewableCard
Represents a meteor swarm card in the game, extending the functionalities of an AdventureCard. This card manages the state and behavior associated with a swarm of meteors during gameplay. It interacts with the game's dice mechanics and maintains state data related to meteors.
See Also:
